message:
SYSTEM: Dev8d_summary.pdf: Página 25
Other benefits
• OGSA-DAI people was there
• I chased them until I got what I needed:
• How to run tests in OGSA-DAI
• Very good framework for running them
• Based on Ruby and YAML
• Run tests, automatic generation of reports, time to be 
configured: 5 minutes (if you configures it previously)
• Linked data people was there
• I chased Andy Seaborne until he explained me how Jena’s 
(D)ARQ worked and why it was that fast
• You meet lots of people
• Bounties: lots of good prices for winners
speaker: SYSTEM
